entry.title: 10-IN-A-ROW FOR CELTIC
entry.summary: CELTIC celebrated their tenth successive victory over Ross County in Dingwall yesterday. David Turnbull, with his third goal of the season against the Highlanders, got the ball rolling in the latest win when he scorched in a low right-foot drive on the cusp of half-time. Luis Palma doubled the advantage with a breathtaking long-range effort [...]
